A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Too much comedy and pretty much a major let down coming off of the build-up from The Force Awakens. Luke's legacy and the Original Trilogy will come across as disrespected to loyal Star Wars that witnessed the originals years ago. I now understand Mark Hamill's feelings on how he disagreed on the way the producers were taking Luke Skywalker. Sadly\, this new Star Wars Film is a product of its time\, pressing agendas like class warfare\, ethnic diversity\, feminism\, animal activism. They should have made a new trilogy outside of the original characters and story line to do the things they have done with this movie.
